review_body: We had an excellent experience with the Inn. They picked us up from a late night flight, though I had to call 3 times to get an answer, and the room was comfortable, clean and quiet. Everyone was very friendly and helpful.

The Pacific Marina Inn is very close, clean, well priced w/ a pool, bar & decent restaurant. Most travelers have flown at least 6 hrs & are connecting to another long -haul flight, perfect for an over night layover. The rooms are simple, but plenty confortable.

In January my friend and myself stayed in Pacific Marina Inn in Hinolulu .The stay was a nightmare . We slept on top of the bed with our beach towels and our cloths on., fearing we would catch something. The walls were parched up . The sink was falling off the walls and the mini fridge was in the bathroom. The room was freezing and all night someone was walking back and forth outside our room .. I put my luggage in front of the door. The manager would not give us another room or money back.
